Web management

covid.gov.cz is under full management of NAKIT, s.p., which handles operation within the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

About creators

Website is being created thanks to the initiative of Dominika Feriho in a cooperation with pro-bono experts Česko.Digital, NAKIT team and content team of the portal.

Big thank belong also to the colleagues of korona.gov.sk.

Content and it's spreading

Contents of this website will be available through an open licence (will be specified soon)
